comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: According to Wikipedia (?!) the Ford Anglia E494A (1948–1953) was available in Australia in a "2-door tourer" . en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ford_Anglia#Anglia_E494A_.281949.E2... Which makes this picture at c.1950 a bit later than most of the Sam Hood photos, doesn't it?

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content:
Dear Beachcomber

Thanks for this information!

Sam Hood worked until 1953, ending his career in Newcastle, rather than Sydney.

The error in dating came from this photograph being part of a large group of undated Hood photographs.
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment._content: Very desirable drop head , exported to USA just after WWII , , but I don't think many drop heads made it over.
